website_summaries.verdict: A larger 11.5-inch screen doesn’t mean a better netbook as this 2-in-1 sacrifices performance for price.
pros: Runs Android-based online app versions of Microsoft Word and Excel
Syncs seamlessly with other Android devices like Samsung smartphones
Keyboard responds quickly, with little to no lag on screen
cons: Speakers are not very good, which isn’t surprising at its price point
Very little memory at 1 GB, which can tax the processor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Basically it's a computer with a big screen but it is light weight! It is easy to start up and running when you get it ad works great! It has a USB port and the tablet is detachable from the buttons! It is also touch screen! HERE IS THE BEST PART: WHEN YOU CHARGE THE TABLET IT CHARGES THE KEYBOARD AT THE SAME TIME!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My RCA Galileo tablet review
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about if i wanted to keep this tablet when i received it. after a few days of using it, i decided i like it. the buttons are large enough to type fast and it has all the features and more than I expected. i purchased it because my Acer Chromebook took a dump after 1 year. I use it for checking email, surfing web, and purchases from my favorite online stores. I like the touch screen feature that my Chromebook did not have. I don't play video games, but many games are available to download from google play. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Wills

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing about it is the speaker
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about it is the speaker. You really need ear buds to video chat or watch videos. Every thing else is fine. When charged go to battery setting and activate the battery saver, you need to do this after every charge. It greatly improves battery life.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet+keyboard combo - amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best deal out there for the price. Pros: * cheap - as in mind-blowing price with respect to competition * fully featured Android machine * good hardware spec, translating into snappy user performance * very responsive keyboard with good tactile feedback Cons: * feels a bit plastic-y - but given the price that is not even an issue * there are some design choice quibbles like the "Screen sleep" button on keyboard is very close to Enter, really easy to get wrong, or that the power port is much too high on the tablet's side panel
customer_reviews.author: Aban

customer_reviews.title: This is one nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one nice!!! 2n1 Tablet, Very responsive. The sound has plenty of volume, The trackpad is convenient, To click on a icon on the screen, You softly press the lower left side of the trackpad, Or you can connect a mouse to the stander usb input. I alread have a ipad mini 2 16gb tablet. But I like the RCA Galileo Pro 11.5" 32GB Tablet better. Beautiful big screen!!, It has expandable storage and also you can transfer files from a usb thumb drive.. Very happy!!!! with my purchase.. I highly recommend this Tablet..
customer_reviews.author: shai will

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sleek, and the tablet detaches easily. The keyboard and pad work great, and you can change stuff by touch. I say VOILÀ! That's french; For how about that. Really, really recommended! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: D. MCDONALDTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice value so far. I did spend an extra $12 on an SD card to expand the memory.
customer_reviews.author: MoRoCo

customer_reviews.title: Its a toy, not a tool.
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. incredibly slow, won't even connect to wifi at full strength unless 5' from router. has real problems running more than one app at a time. the screen resolution is adequate but pretty rough for gaming - again you get what you pay for. keyboard is awkward and i'm constantly hitting "screen off" instead of "delete" button. i rank this more as a toy than a tool. for the money, i would give this more stars, but the speed/lagging issues are a real frustration. all other devices on same network have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: dougk

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, not good as a laptop (pc)
customer_reviews.text: not useful as a lap top if you need to use office produts. however, as a tablet for entertainment purposes, we love it. not too small and love the key board.
customer_reviews.author: #1Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen is heavy so it keeps falling back wards. Nothing works on it
customer_reviews.text: Well....It's an ok tablet. Thing is the screen is heavier than the keyboard so it keeps tipping over I had to come back and re write my review because rhis tablet ain't shit everything you download it shows stopped working. This is stupud please i wish i had done a thorough back ground check before i purchase please don't buy this. Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Shashane

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good screen, detachable pad is nice. Keys are big. Works great, easy to use. Camera works great.
customer_reviews.author: T Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed. Dont recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Screen flips round in circles or will rotate even when screen is supposed to be locked. Doesn't always turn on when button is pushed. It's very glitchy. It is very, very slow.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crump

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order for this tablet. First one for myself, second for my best friend for his birthday and he loves it. This tablet is what I describe as a small computer. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Hated this product. I received it and it only partially worked. It wouldn't download any apps(I kept getting error codes). I took it to a computer repair and they couldn't fix it either. Sent it back got my refund and went to Walmart and bought a cambio and I love it. Stay away from the gaileo it's cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good for College
customer_reviews.text: This is prefect for taking notes. I used this for college and it works perfectly with the super small desktop they have. The keyboard is a great quality and you can use word from the play store. Also, it came a week earlier then stated! I highly recommend this tablet to anyone looking for school. It's perfect for college.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: reall liking this... roomie has older model ...
customer_reviews.text: reall liking this ... roomie has older model so got this one on his suggestion ... very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet. As someone who has trouble seeing the size is great and performance is wonderful. The only issue I have is that the screen seems to be easily scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis C.

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the keyboard keys for certain functions
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5-start item for the low price. I especially like the keyboard keys for certain functions. Battery life is very good: I leave it on, but use the screen off button when I'm not using it (which I admit I don't use it much) and it's still got most of its battery charge after 2 days. Viewing angle of the screen is pretty narrow, but again, plenty good for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: J Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price! I'm planning on using it to sing choral music. So far, the music scores appear slightly compressed, but still readable. I'm amazed at how much this little table offers for the price. The keyboard has just the right feel ... not over-responsive, and definitely not under-responsive, as a previously purchased off brand was. Similarly, the touch screen is very responsive. The tablet detaches and re-attaches snugly from and to the keyboard. There is not too much clutter on screen, and none of the message noise that a previously purchased off brand had. Well done, RCA!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kipp

customer_reviews.title: The screen rolls.
customer_reviews.text: It came broken. The screen kept glitching and rolling. Didn’t even want to take the chance of things getting worst. So I’m returning. You truly get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Slow - but a good worker
customer_reviews.text: This isnt a fancy gadget. If you’re a gamer or a movie streamer this may not be for you. Its slow ... but like a plow horse it gets the job done. fairly sturdy and quite heavy - i have nicknamed it my taptop (tablet laptop) because while smaller than my deceased metal cases lenovo laptop its heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Kesi

customer_reviews.title: Limited memory expansion, problem when typing - otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months use, now when I type, the letter e appears at the end of whatever I type and when in a moving vehicle the letter e continues nonstop all across the screen. This is an inconvenience to type in the password to unlock the screen as I need to hit escape and retry over and over. It took a long time to recognize a 32gb micro sd card. It refuses to recognize a 64gb micro sd card. As it is turned on says Vudu has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: nice screen size
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price. This tablet is a little on the heavy side, nice screen size. Some graphics have issues, mainly lettering in some of the apps, letters are not completely showing properly. Sound could be a little better when is come to the bass. So far haven't had any issues with battery life. Product description can be confusing when it come to memory. Will update post if I found any issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Army

customer_reviews.title: Nah. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t want to rate it one star. It’s not the worst. It the colors and resolution are pretty bad. I figured their Viking lineup was AWESOME, so this Galileo model would be even better. Nah. Not the case. Can’t see the screen at certain angles and is blurry AF. Colors are horrible, too. Also, the keyboard pictured isn’t what you get. You get a smaller sized keyboard with a huge border around the keys. Too small for my hands so if you’ve got larger hands be prepared to type key by key.
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard unusable
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is unusable. The trackpad cannot be turned off and the mouse jumps all over the screen due to the fact that the palm will touch it while typing. No way to turn it off without taking it apart (I researched it). The mouse speed is not adjustable, so when using the trackpad it's almost impossible to get the cursor where you need it (press a button on the screen, for instance), you have to touch the screen. For someone who doesn't plan to use the keyboard it would be fine, but there better products comparably priced without a keyboard. I had no other problem than the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky T

customer_reviews.title: User-friendly AND budget-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite pleased with this little machine. My trusty and faithful old laptop finally bit the dust, and I knew that I wouldn't have enough room in the budget for a replacement laptop for a while. The RCA Galileo Pro easily fit into my budget so that I have something to work with until I can afford a regular laptop. You can't do anything wild or fancy on this machine, but if you're just needing something for emails, surfing the web, and simple tasks, the RCA Galileo Pro has you covered.
customer_reviews.author: Kitra Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying...
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged nicely.. The screen size is nice and the keyboard is very comfortable. the wifi antenna is poor at best and will not allow video streaming without buffering. This is a deal breaker for me as I bought this tablet in large part for Netflix, YouTube etc viewing..which brings me to the screen quality. This is pretty low resolution and NOT an ISP display! Viewing angles are terrible, speaker is tinny, but loud. For tapping out an email it's fine, but when you try to use it for movies it's disappointing. Battery life is lacking as well. Not recommending this one.
customer_reviews.author: MooDog815G

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies quickly
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies very quickly you have to continually leave this plugged in, otherwise a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and very portable
customer_reviews.text: Bulgur it for a friend that never used computers before. Very easy to use and very portable. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Love my RCA Gallileo Pro tablet! I graduated from the Viking Pro, then to the Maven Pro and now, the Gallileo Pro. My only complaint is the volume toggle switch on the back of the tablet...extremely hard to find. Silly me, though...I later noticed a volume control at the bottom of my screen. Problem solved! I trust RCA and have found that these tablets stand the test of time. As I graduate to the next model, I pass my old ones down to the grandchildren. The Gallileo Pro's keyboard is larger and easier to type on, also. Love the huge screen! No complaints from me. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: MickeyP

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the Tablet a lot. I'm still exploring the features and reading "how to articles" on the internet. The Tablet is adequately fast for what I do ... reading Ebooks, Word Processing, Spread Sheets. The screen is high definition enough for that. I got tired of my "Windows 10" computer hanging up every little bit and decided to try a new OS. Since I have an "Andriod OS" phone I decided to go with it. I"ve had it about a month now with no problems except "operator error".
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Just Wouldn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I've had to factory reset 3 times just trying to install basic apps. I had an older RCA Galileo Pro and never had these issues. Lasted 7 years before quitting. Had this one barely a week and I'm so frustrated. The look and feel is great but the functionality just is not there. Got to the point where I couldn't even click on Settings without getting a message of "Unfortunately Settings has stopped working". Couldn't update Google, uninstall and reinstall would just cause another app to fail working. Amazon Tech tried to help me but couldn't. Manufacturer wasn't available during the weekend I called, so I decided to return the item. Only had the table 6 days.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie B.

customer_reviews.title: Too dim to be usable...
customer_reviews.text: The speed and operation of this tablet were fine, especially for the price. The screen was so dim that it was washed out by the least amount of ambient light, and visibility was totally dependent on angle of view. It was only clear when facing directly in front... any angle at all created a glare and washed out the screen.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rail

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable value
customer_reviews.text: My two teenage daughters needed something suitable for playing games and doing school papers (their other laptops finally died). I was a little skeptical when I saw the pricing on this product, but having two teenagers . . . well, I can't afford two laptops again at full price. Set up was a breeze and they haven't voiced a single complaint, so it must be working at their level of expectation. That makes this mom happy. Hopefully it will last through the coming school year.
customer_reviews.author: Romantic

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you’re an experienced computer, smartphone, tablet user or impressed by high quality photos and bells/whistles this might not be for you. While I wouldn’t be satisfied with this for myself, it is perfect for my less experienced older mom. It’s simple, the screen is very large and easy to see. Best of all the graphics and speed are decent enough to keep up with her love of Pinterest and web browsing. I wouldn’t rely on this for games or print worthy photos but it’s not a bad option for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: this is great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: First off, bear in mind that this is NOT an iPad, or a high end samsung tablet. This is a bare bones, lower tier tablet, hence the 120 price tag....with that in mind, this is great value for the money. If used only for netflix/hulu/hbogo etc, it works great...I like the mini hdmi port, allowing it to be hooked up to any hdmi TV (hotel rooms especially come to mind). If your a traveler and looking for something to watch your shows on, this fits the bill nicely
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Returned the first order because I thought it was defective ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned the first order because I thought it was defective tablet. Ordered a second tablet & it does the exact same as the first tablet. This Tablet WILL NOT LET ME DOWNLOAD/TRANSFER SONGS/ALBUMS FROM MY COMPUTER MEDIA PLAYER TO GOOGLE PLAY. WILL NOT BE BUYING ANOTHER FROM VIPOUTLET AGAIN. FRUSTRATED........I WILL KEEP THIS TABLET CAUSE I DO NOT WANT TO DEAL WITH THEM AGAIN. JUST TAKE MY LOSS & BUY ANOTHER TABLET ELSEWHERE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Rca  Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Well, all I had was a smart phone and not a lot of money so I chose the RCA tablet with keyboard. Overall its a decent tablet, but seems more deisig e for kids use. The screen quality is not as good as I would have liked. It good but not like my TV. The settings feature is very basic. There is no word program that I have found so I will get an app for that. I would say if you want an affordable tablet that will do all the basics, this will serve you well. I'm happy to have it and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bargain, can't imagine everyone doesn't have one. I even keep a spare which has come in handy when a friend needs one. Also makes a great gift. I bought this because it was cheap and I just wanted something I could use for quick searches and email. Now I use it almost exclusively. Even though it has a detachable keyboard--great feature usually on considerably more expensive tablets--I keep it attached and use both the touch screen and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for me
customer_reviews.text: The price was right. It was as advertised and that in today’s world is saying something. The android concept took some getting used to but it is functional. My high end iPad lasted 14 months before becoming “unfixable” and this is not as good as a working iPad Pro, but I can buy six or seven for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and durable!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice tablet but exceeded my expectations in that it functions literally as a mini computer and tablet. It has serious weight to it and is very durable and well constructed. It functions better than expected and is very fast. The detachable keyboard is very convenient. I would give it 5 stars if there was a way to have an option to turn off the touch screen, but other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED what it offered
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED what it offered, but it quit running within a week of purchase. Amazon refunded me easily, but I didn't have enough confidence in the manufacturer/seller to purchase another one as a replacement. I liked the weight, the ease of attaching/unattaching the keyboard and it had nice apps/software preloaded. I'm sad it didn't work out...
customer_reviews.author: pamela R. Dahlberg

customer_reviews.title: RCA Galileo Pro tablet with keyboard
customer_reviews.text: By fart the BEST low-priced android tablet on the market right now, and I have tried several! Does everything I needed it for and then some. Perhaps include a better camera and support for game controllers and this could be a full-blown laptop. Love the convenience of tablets, but to be productive with some applications I need to get my hands on a physical keyboard. Galileo Pro did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: dRU Ravyn

customer_reviews.title: My first tablet
customer_reviews.text: The first time I dropped it, from my lap on a phone call. I discovered how the keyboard separates from the touch interface unit/tablet with virtual key pad. So, it's durable. I purchased a used one. So, I hadn't had time to go on line for instructions. The camera quality is poor 😒 As a tablet, it works fine. Quad core, like my phone. Works nice. I'll install a sd card soon.
customer_reviews.author: LEE R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Sweet Buy
customer_reviews.text: Okay literally I was skeptical at first by how good of a deal this was but wow this was such a money saver compared to my other laptop I had bought before and basically wasted over 800 dollars. But okay so the package literally came within a day and a half. Arrived in perfect condition. They boxed it all nice and you get the charger with it too of course. But this tablet/keyboard is really great it runs fast. And has a lot of memory. So I would definitely recommend this to anyone trying to save money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst piece of garbage i have ever bought. It is slower than a boat to China really slow it i had known i never would have wasted my money on this garbage. Friends when I say a piece of garbage please believe me I have had many computers but this is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: susan gulino

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: This tablet will not pick up the Wifi that is on, just states connecting. It does do much at all. On a scale of 1 to 5 I give it a one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Terrific for its price. Reasonably fast and has great compatibility with other devices (PC, tv etc.). No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bluepraetorian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Price is really good but if you're expecting iPad like resolution and speed this is not for you. I find the screen difficult to read or even a little fuzzy when it's in portrait mode. Speed is nothing to write home about and battery life is only so-so, This might make a good back-up machine while your main tablet is charging or being repaired but for continuous use I find it hard on the eyes and a little awkward to use. I would definitely not recommend this machine for daily routine work or even for students.
customer_reviews.author: rtk11226

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT recommend this tablet to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Slowest tablet in the world. I tried to find a fix for the slow speed of the tablet... No help. I would NOT recommend this tablet to anyone ... Pure junk... Garbage can issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn R. Shell

customer_reviews.title: Unstable operating system
customer_reviews.text: I've had to do 2 factory resets, and now it just keeps telling me that Google has stopped working and won't let me do anything else, so it needs another factory reset. It never let me download and install Minecraft or Fox Sports Go. Overdrive worked for a while, but then stopped. When I reinstalled it, it kept crashing, which led to the first factory reset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Fail
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet two years ago. The battery only lasted about 6 months and has to be plugged in at all times and will only charge to 3%. The screen is of poor quality and is very fuzzy. The tablet has become so slow it is unusable. I have reset it to factory settings and have not been able to get it to work properly. I would not recommend buying this tablet. I only paid $108 for it at the time and it was not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Main reason I have stuck with rca was for the QWERTY as I have trouble with touch screens do to illness in fingers, but this particular device did not last 2 months with the board! This is my 4th rca tablet, and also my last. I’m old enough to remember when things had been built to last and not trash, sadly those days are long gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter used her birthday $ to buy this and has been so frustrated with it. Freezes often, she gets error messages saying the programs are no longer working, and I’ve had to reboot it three times in the few months she has owned it. Tried to return it but wasn’t able.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my tablet, and have had it for a couple of months now, and the only issue is the os. It takes forever to boot, since it says 'optimizing 1 app of 1'. I have deleted all the apps I can, and it still is having the same problem,, taking 5 minutes to finally boot. Once it does though, it is a great tablet. The attaching keyboard is great when taking on trips too. the graphics are pretty nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: scrappygirl

customer_reviews.title: Good value; keyboard not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Great price; real value for a browser machine; keyboard is smaller than shown in the photo; photo shows full sized rh shift key and the keyboard extending almost the full width of the machine; the actual keyboard is 1" narrower than the machine on both sides and has a small sized rh shift key; they key spacing is also too tight and causes me problems with touch typing.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Zanto

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great...but worth it for budget conscious
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this more stars, I truly do. Pros: cheap let’s not kid ourselves. Love the keyboard and ability to detach. Light weight. Doesn’t come loaded with lots of bulk software so clean install. Setup was 2 mins. Overall for the price it is a great reader, internet browser or email machine. Other apps get bogged down a big with memory and processor but will run. Cons: Battery life is 4-6 hours on a good day. Processing power is slow at times or under load. Resolution was a kicker for me it could be so much more!
customer_reviews.author: hart3856

customer_reviews.title: The tablet sets perfect on my small desk However keep in mind is ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet sets perfect on my small desk However keep in mind is still a tablet It has a Built-in mouse on the keyboard and this makes it hard to operate A does have the functions of a computer in that is good It takes some time Getting used toLooking at the keyboard I can see where the design where there are waves in The plastic is cheapAnd definitely the Built-in mouseCan comes more problems when typingWould not recommend this over a computer
customer_reviews.author: D.E.O

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else
customer_reviews.text: This tablet sucks. It's slow, the definition on the screen looks almost pixelated, the speaker (yes, there's only one) might as well have come from a 70s transistor radio, and the battery life is super short. I can't even update the OS. I'm never buying another RCA tablet.
customer_reviews.author: The Radtkes

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately either I received a defective unit or it just really is substandard. Remember the days of dial up internet? That's how SLOWLY this processor works. I've owned it 3 months and it's going in the trash. I can't even donate it. I wouldn't do that to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good The device is cheap and plastic looking however it performs very quickly and is very nice The pros are : 32gb of storage Screen size Price (at time of purchase) Cons The screen doesn't have the best brightness color or viewing angles but not the worst either And the battery takes a few hours to charge This device is great for writing and light browsing but if you plan to watch video on it I'd recommend getting a device with a higher resolution screen
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Knight

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight device that had a little more "oomph" than my Kindle, and this was just the ticket. I travel a lot, and I get weary of lugging my laptop to meetings and events for which I only need to take notes, download documents, and keep up with social media in my free time. Setup was quick, maybe because I also have an Android phone, and regular updates are available for apps. I'm so glad I took a chance and purchased this item!
customer_reviews.author: Elinor

customer_reviews.title: Battery and rotating issues
customer_reviews.text: I Love RCA! Normally these are the best tablets. Seems like this is reconditioned. The screen doesn't automatically rotate. I had to put app on to get it to rotate. The tablet turns on by itself and drains battery for no reason. Its really screwed up. Its the worst tablet and can't be fixed. I don't return things to amazon. I never have.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend. In all not a bad tablet/laptop
customer_reviews.text: Like! sometimes screen rotates the wrong way such as I may need it to be horizontal but it turn vertical while using the key board I then have to use touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ferre

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price. You get lots of tablet for little money. I do find the monitor lacking sharpness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for a few weeks and am not impressed. It is veryyy slow and the touch screen is not very sensitive. I have to touch it multiples times for it to function. I have not downloaded any extra apps on this tablet so I cannot understand why it is so slow. I thought that maybe it was my internet connection but I have various other devices connected to my wifi and they work fine. Battery life for this tablet is also not good. I use it mainly for internet browsing and sending out emails and it has not met the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Product is broken..stuck in screen saver after two months of once a week usage. Update: since I wrote this review I also want to add that we received a new replacement in the mail today. Excellent customer service from Amazon and RCA!
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: RCA Galileo Pro 11.5" 32GB Touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: I received my product it was used. It was scratch, finger prints on the monitor and some type of sticky stuff. The one cord that came with it was just thrown in the box. I had to use my cord to charge it because it was the wrong one and after charging it the screen was lock and someone's Gmail accounts kept popping up. I called Amazon three times and I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It's big enough to read comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's big enough to read comfortably, versatile, fast, and the resolution is high enough. It is a cheap, utilitarian tablet. My only gripe with it is that the touchpad is jumpy - if you're anywhere around it, you will end up somewhere else on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Policy

customer_reviews.title: So far I like this. I bought this for my 12-year son ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED stopped working after 3 months. Order at your own risk. This was only used as a back up and rarely used. I like this. I bought this for my 12-year son and I love that you can detach the keyboard if necessary. I have not found any true flaws but I also haven't had time to play with it much so I gave it a 4 because I haven't completely tried the entire tablet. I will update once enough time has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard size shown in pictures on amazon is not the same as I received. In Amazon pictures the keys go to the edges of the keyboard, but when I received it the keys are much further from the edges making the keyboard small than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: H Hartson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son. He loves it. Hasn't put it down since he got it. So far everything about it he loves. BTW my son is 57yrs old. He hasn't complained one time about anything on this little computer. So I guess I did good on this one.
customer_reviews.author: babbs55

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT have Mini HDMI port!
customer_reviews.text: These Q & A's are very misleading.. I purchased this tablet specifically because the answer to that question was "yes, it has an HDMI port". Mine arrived today and it does NOT. Luckily I have a daughter who needed a better tablet, otherwise I woulda sent this thing right back. I will order another one from another seller. But next time I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend anyone to purchase this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the RCA Viking Pro 10" prior to purchasing this one, and I am glad I stayed with RCA. Great android tablet for only $88, able to watch videos and play games on this RCA Galileo Pro. Screen resolution could be a little better, but this is a GREAT deal for a good android tablet. Highly recommend anyone to purchase this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: StuckinWV

customer_reviews.title: Such a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this and it is constantly saying that something of Google has stopped working and will pop up on the screen over and over again - super annoying. He can barely download any apps on it and then none of them will work. They will load up and then close saying there was a problem. Very disappointed in this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Corless

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This Tablet is extremely slow. You have to touch the screen 2 to 3 times for it to work! The keyboard works when it gets goid snd ready! The screen quality is just awful! Blurry & pixelated. I have never been more dissatisfied in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bee

customer_reviews.title: RCA Galileo Pro worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Growing up RCA was a major component in purchasing in our home. Televisions, Record Players, (yes I'm that old). There was no doubt I would be disappointed in any RCA product. I just appreciate Amazon providing such a reasonable price. Which made my decision very easy. It just right for my personal needs. Margo T
customer_reviews.author: Margo T.

customer_reviews.title: Slow,Basic tablet low memory
customer_reviews.text: Its slow to start up it doesn't have very much internal memory, due to the apps that come with it and you can't remove them,its real slow uploading files from my phone both Bluetooth and WiFi. Its great for streaming Netflix,Hulu etc You use the keyboard only to scroll and audio ff ply rr
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Tablet and already it's performance is totally better than my over price Sony Tablet that I replaced this with. I may just but another one.
customer_reviews.author: Brittsta370

customer_reviews.title: So far is good it looks like a computer you can do Anything ...
customer_reviews.text: So far is good it looks like a computer you can do Anything u want plus the google store to watch videos ,Facebook. Netflick or play games is very smooth and the bonus is like an iPad. Also u can place it as a stand to view movies. For the price is ok is no an mac or iPad or a Microsoft surfer. I just use it when I go to my appointments plus love the keyboard keys very nice
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Brought this for my daughter so she can use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my daughter so she can use it as a learning tool, she loves it she uses it online to learn her numbers and alphabets, she has dropped it and there was no damage. although I will need to get a case for it, you can put password protection on it and link it to emails and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Leah9m

customer_reviews.title: ... battery life is not as long as I would like but every time I fell for my kids are ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one I purchased and although the battery life is not as long as I would like but every time I fell for my kids are on the internet we get lost in it anyway but it is a great product and I'm actually going to be ordering my for so we all can have one and making my kids can stay off mine
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: What I love about the Galileo is that it's bigger than my mini laptop. I also love the ease of being able to detach and reattach the keyboard. I have 1 very small dislike and that is I didn't pay attention to what the pixels were. So recording is not bad but it's not 1080p either. Over all I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Deaconess T

customer_reviews.title: Laptop version of android cell phone
customer_reviews.text: This product to me is a laptop version of my LG g6 - so if I want to watch tv shows/ movies that I purchased on Google play store or listen to music or watch any YouTube videos,I just open up my laptop( which also doubles as a tablet too) and play a favorite movie- tv show- or song to my heart's delight .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goonan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Great computer for my needs. I am 11, and this helps me with typing, schoolwork, and even lets you print. The bad reviews almost stopped me from buying it, but I did and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Taellious

customer_reviews.title: slow junk
customer_reviews.text: well I just had about 2 paragraphs of carefully detailed info about why not to buy this piece of junk and I accidentally barely swiped something on the keyboard and it wiped everything out, resulting in me wanting to once and for all smash this thing into a million chunks with the biggest hammer I can find. Don't waste your money on this if you have any sanity to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Peahen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my children for school. I purchased in May and just now took them out. One works perfect. One has issues with the screen, it is really dark and you can barely see anything. I called support and we were unable to fix it. Because I waited so long I have to pay for it to be returned. The process was easy but I am still waiting to here back on where to send it back to. A little disappointed, hopefully they get it returned back to me before school starts.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Little over a year had to do a factory reset due to issues and totally locked up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to wifi
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice and larger than expected but will not stay connected to the internet. One minute it say connected then it says identification problem. What a bummer my daughter was so excited to receive this for her bday
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service with RCA and I sent the device for repair and took too long to return.
customer_reviews.text: After return it still could not load my important apps so it did not work for me it is of no use to me so I returned. Very slow as well. The technical support Asurion was excellent. It ended up costing more money to send it to repair and because so long repair it returned to me out of warranty. I paid extra insurance with the postal service to send the device for repair. Hind sight I should have just returned the device to amazon and will never purchase RCA again.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the price. Does everything I need it to do. Great battery life. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: robert christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Bought 5
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 5 of these for family members and have had good luck with them. The one I ordered for my mom in Dec quit after 2 months but customer service was really helpful and is doing the repairs now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much so happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: no windows or mac so you can't download games also no place to put a disk or cd but besides that I Love it! It bigger than I expected and I love the fact that it comes off the keyboard so it's like a huge tablet. The tough screen is great. Everything is perfect. You can add a passcode to get on like an iPhone or a pattern like an android. It's threw google so you'll have to set up a google account if you don't have one. You can download apps for it just like an iPhone as well as songs and movies and all that.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: Owned it less than a year. Purchased leather protective case with it. Used maybe 2 dozen times. Screen has a crack running down the middle from top to bottom. Everything on right side has no more touch screen capability. Piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Greer

customer_reviews.title: So far it is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my SO to watch his programs on and he freaking loves it! The picture is crisp and the charge is both fast and long-lasting. Definitely, worth the money I put into it and I'm quite satisfied overall. The delivery was fast also. 9/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nottsdottir

customer_reviews.title: A AWESOM TABLET FOR THE MONEY - GET ONE!
customer_reviews.text: My name is Tom and I just recieved my tablet today. Who ever said that the camera did not take good photos, must of had a lemon. Mine takes excellent photos and does everything that it was said to do. The sound quality could be better, but its not a big deal. All you need is a USB external speaker. Its best to use a mouse with it, for the touch pad is a little hard to use. I am a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: and there are things I need to get used to I know it's going to be fun.
customer_reviews.text: It just came in the mail, I've been playing a bit, and there are things I need to get used to I know it's going to be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Suis Odell

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is beautiful and I love the way the router picks up ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is beautiful and I love the way the router picks up my Internet from a long distance . The bluetooth doesn't seem to work perfectly , but it works well enough with the way the tablet operates . The tablet is better and easier to use than my previous tablet . The fantastic router helps . I love the way the keyboard operates and it also seems to make things easier .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact computer. I can play games and send email.
customer_reviews.author: michelle oden

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of junk!! no power, very slow to respond, locks up constantly, most of the apps aren't optimized for that size of screen. It's basically like a big Kindle, and not all the apps work with it. Do not buy this item!! In fact, I would not recommend buying any electronics from Amazon ever. My experience is that every electronic item I've ever purchased from them has been garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Impaler00777

product_meta.title: RCA Galileo 11.5" 32 GB Touchscreen Tablet Computer with Keyboard Case Quad-Core 1.3Ghz Processor 1GB Memory 32GB HDD Webcam Wifi Bluetooth Android 6.0 - Charcoal
product_meta.description: Color:CharcoalIntroducing the RCA 11 Galileo Pro 2-in-1 tablet with detachable keyboard. The 11 Galileo Pro operates on Android Marshmallow and showcases the operating system's brand-new material design.
feature_bullets: Intel Atom Quad-Core Processor 1.3GHz is powerful enough to zoom through applications and tasks
SPEED: 1.3GHz 4 Quad-Core Processor. 1024×600 Touchscreen Display (11.5″). Battery life up to 6 hours
BUILT-IN: 32GB Flash Storage Memory (MicroSD-expandable), Dual Front/Rear Camera, Full USB and Micro USB port, Bluetooth, and Rechargeable Battery
FOR WORK OR PLAY: Stay efficient with Android OS 6.0 (Go Edition) and preinstalled apps available at the touch of your fingertips. Compatible with Google Play
INCLUDES: Free travel keyboard and AC adapter. Ports/Jacks: Micro USB, Full USB, MicroSD card slot, 3.5mm Headphone jack, Microphone, DC jack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,283 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
